name: Các hoạt động liên quan đến du lịch (Travel Activities)

words.vietnamese: Đi du lịch, sự đi lại
words.example: I love to travel to new countries.
We went on a short trip to the beach last weekend.
The long journey across the desert was challenging.
We are planning a family vacation next summer.
They plan to visit their relatives next month.
Let's explore the old castle and its surroundings.
We spent the whole day sightseeing in the city.
I need to book a flight for my trip to London.
We need to check in before 3 PM and check out by noon.
Don't forget to pack your toothbrush and passport.
